meanings.definition: Feel intense dislike or disgust for.
meanings.sent1: She loathed the taste of broccoli.
meanings.sent2: He always loathed cleaning his room.
meanings.sent3: The cat loathed wearing the silly hat.
meanings.sent4: The student loathed the idea of taking a pop quiz.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs made her loathed breakfast.

meanings.sent1: He loathed going to the dentist.
meanings.sent2: She loathed having to wake up early.
meanings.sent3: The dog loathed taking a bath in the cold water.
meanings.sent4: The child loathed eating vegetables at dinner.
meanings.sent5: The athlete loathed missing practice due to an injury.
